long_description: Nothing is worse than fumbling to find your map during a ride. With the Novara Bartop handlebar bag in front of you, your map stays dry and visible at all times. Bag mounts on top of handlebar and features a clear, no-PVC pocket that displays your map while protecting it from the elements. Padded main compartment holds gear securely; internal mesh sleeves and key tether keep small things organized. Reflective detailing increases visibility in low light; includes clip loop for your LED blinker. 3 rip-and-stick handlebar attachments provide a secure, tight fit.
